Bitcoin is an impenetrable fortress of validation.  It doesn't matter if you created the transaction/block, or if someone else sent it to you: If it's not valid it's not getting in.  All nodes enforce validation in tandem.  Some people still don't seem to understand this concept.  https://t.co/sqc2bLeNH1
